heading: Chumash language materials.
general-note: Here are entered works written in Chumash intended primarily for general information or recreational reading. Such works with text also given in English are further subdivided by the subdivision Bilingual, i.e.,. Chumash language materials--Bilingual.. Reading texts in Chumash containing material for instruction and practice in reading that language are entered under. Chumash language--Readers..
